item.title: Container Security with Microsoft Defender for Cloud
item.description: In recent years, containerization has become a popular approach to application deployment and management. Containers enable developers to build more quickly and efficiently in the cloud by offering a convenient and streamlined way to package applications and their dependencies. While lightweight and portable, containerized environments introduce new attack vectors and risks such as runtime vulnerabilities, configuration errors and lateral movement between containers. Ensuring the security of containerized environments requires a comprehensive approach that involves multiple layers of security ...
